\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 68797}

\subsection*{Tired and Stiff}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{StonerBonee}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 50 mg & oral & Pharms - Trazodone & pill / tablet\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 150.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I took a 50mg pill under the impression that this was a painkiller.  My friend at school would often hand out painkillers, so I assumed the trazodone she gave me was a painkiller.  After the pill starts kicking in I have to go back to class.  I spent most of class with my head on the table, fading in and out of consciousness.  I also had a boner for like two hours, not in an aroused way, it was just there.  I do not intend to take Trazodone again, all it's good for is sleeping and erectile dysfunction.

\end{document}
